summary: An ex-CIA agent and his estranged daughter are forced on the run when his employers erase all records of his existence, and mark them both for termination as part of a wide-reaching international conspiracy.
cast: Aaron Eckhart|Liana Liberato|Olga Kurylenko|Garrick Hagon|Eric Godon|Yassine Fadel|Neil Napier|David Bark-Jones|Alexander Fehling|Nick Alachiotis|Ronnie Commissaris|Fabrice Boutique|Debbie Wong|Ron White|Katelijne Verbeke|Alexandre von Sivers|Hassaba Halibi|John Dobrynine|Ben Van Ostade|Maxime Paradis|Brahim Waabach|Carlo Mestroni|Kent McQuaid|Sasha Dominique|Maxime Morin|Simone-Élise Girard|Jade Hassouné|Richard Robitaille|Danny Blanco Hall|Calista Somwe|Zaire Souchi|Cyril Kengne|Achille Ridolfi|Keir Cutler|Brett Watson|Kate Linder|Claire Jacques|Claire Beugnies|Éléonore Lamothe|Mohamed Dibej|Warl Aarab|Lidia Aviles|Steve Barry|Michael Cambier|Carl Crevier|Kurt De Meuter|Vincent Doms|Andre Givogue|CinSyla Key|Sasha Lipskaia|Damien Marchal|Lydia Moore|Michael Morgante|Kim Selby|Sebastien Soudais
title: El último testigo
